rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {GRN1040, GRN2040, GRN2225}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS2096, GRN1040, GRN1060, GRN1080, GRN1100, GRN2060, GRN2080, GRN2100, GRN2225}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ATS1093, ATS2093}

description: 1: A communicatively oriented German language course. Specifically, students will work through a range of topics including the world of fairy tales, education, work, crime, personal relationships, migration and the environment.2: An examination of modern German culture in a socio-historical context through the study of selected texts. This component will familiarise students with the key elements and main stages of the cultural history of the German-speaking region in this period.
